title: Moonrider Outpost
text: Raiders have begun fighting over disputed grain fields.
blocka: xxACTION Spend 3 xxORE and Test (Rapport 5). If passed, burn threat, and gain 2 xxFOOD dice.
blockb: xxFIRE Spend 3 xxFOOD or lower Sunrider disposition by one.

title: Silk Roads
text: If you aren't building relationships - you will be left behind.
blocka: xxACTION Spend 11 xxTIMBER, burn threat, and gain 2 xxFOOD dice.

title: Amber Hand
text: The pact with Red Bank has not been forgotten by the Amber Hand.
blocka: xxACTION Test (Command 5). If passed, burn threat and move characters to a spotlight location. If failed, gain 2 xxDISCORD.
blockb: xxFORCEFUL If there is more than one usable spotlight location, flip a spotlight location card. Location is unusuable for remainder of the season.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Trade Agreement
blocka: xxACTION Spend two resource dice to initiate trade with a faction. Gain a number of new resource dice equal to the disposition of the faction. Dice gained and spent should match trade wheel for faction.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Development Research
blocka: xxACTION Purchase one available development. Add development to asset discard pile.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Amber Lodge
blocka: xxACTION Spend 1 xxFORTUNE to look at the top asset card on either draw pile. Return the card to the top when finished.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Tactical Planning
blocka: xxACTION Spend 3 xxFORTUNE to take an asset from your discard pile into your hand.

title: xxSPOTLIGHT Resource Gathering
blocka: xxACTION Gain one resource die of any type.

title: Gray River
text: The Gray River rolls through the shade of the dense elms, carrying dark earth from deeper within the forest.
blocka: xxACTION Gain 2 xxTIMBER dice.

title: Mirror Woods
text: The source of magical power in the North.
blocka: For each progress token on this location, characters at North Oaks locations get +1 to tests against foes.
blockb: xxACTION Spend 4 xxMANA and become weary to add one progress to this location.

title: Outer Fernbrake
text: Simple folk banded together in the shadow of darkness.
blocka: xxICE If there any Restless Dead here, gain one xxAPOTHEOSIS.

title: Musty Tomb
text: A place hiding the oldest secrets.
blocka: xxACTION Take 2 xxDISCORD to move any number of Restless Dead to this location.
blockb: xxMOON One character at this location is shaken.

title: Hogel Manor
text: For a Sunrider, Hogel's decorations and appointments are almost gaudy, and his demeanor doubly so.
blocka: xxSUN Take 1 xxDISCORD for each issue in play at this location.

title: Horsethief Meadows
text: Feats of martial prowess take place across the wide open plains.
blocka: xxACTION Spend 6 xxPROGRESS to increase Security track by one.

title: Song Bluff
text: Amongst the Sunriders, honor and family are more important than diversity of thought.
blocka: xxQUICK Take xxDISCORD equal to Freedom.

title: Spirit Lake
text: The clear waters of Spirit Lake still reflect back the wisdom of ancient ancestors. Feeding the lake earns the Sunriders' respect.
blocka: xxACTION Spend 4 xxMANA to burn any issue in play at a Sunriders location.

title: The Rosy Freetrader
text: A popular meeting place for both the poor and wealthy of Eastkeep.
blocka: xxACTION Move one Graycloak to the Rosy Freetrader.

title: Map Hall
text: Somewhere amongst the piles of maps and ledgers are useful Imperial plans.
blocka: xxACTION Spend one xxSECRETS to gain two dice of any one resource.
blockb: xxQUICK One character at this location is weary.

title: House of Cloves
text: Through rings of smoke move cloaked figures willing to provide all manner of things for the right price.
blocka: Effect: All characters at this location have +1 Disguise.
blockb: xxICE One character at this location is angry.

title: Guild of Secrets
text: If there is a nexus of evil in Eastkeep, it is most certainly the guild of secrets.
blocka: All obstacles at this location have +2 xxDISCORD.

title: Lush Fields
blocka: xxACTION Spend 4 xxFORTUNE to gain one xxFOOD die.

title: Salmon Run
blocka: xxACTION Task (Survival).
blockb: xxCIRCLE Spend 13 progress to raise xxFOOD track by one.
blockc: xxFORCEFUL One character at this location is weary.

title: The Weird Rock
blocka: Effect: All characters at this location have +1 Lore.
blockb: xxMOON One character at this location is shaken.

title: Maplewood
blocka: xxACTION Gain one xxTIMBER.

title: Spinner Lakes
blocka: xxACTION Spend 8 xxLUXURY to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: Green Haven
blocka: Effect: All characters increase their Thievery by Gravewood disposition while at least one character is at this location.
blockb: xxFIRE One character at this location is angry.

title: First Haven
blocka: xxACTION Spend 3 xxLUXURY to discard one threat.

title: Dowling Farm
text: Nexus of Imperial discontent.
blocka: xxACTION Spend 5 xxLUXURY to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: The Salty Freetrader
text: Where everybody - every single body - knows your name.
blocka: xxQUICK One character at this location is weary.

title: Whitehold
text: Graycloak headquarters in the breadbasket of the Empire.
blocka: All guards (obstacles) at this location have +1 xxDISCORD.

title: Under Whitehold
text: The caverns below Whitehold have both riches and traps.
blocka: xxACTION Take two xxDISCORD to gain one xxLUXURY die.
blockb: xxFIRE One character at this location is wounded.

title: Sparrow Keep
text: How is it that a nexus of such evil activity was allowed to grow so large?
blocka: xxFORCEFUL One character at this location is wounded.

title: Outer Fernbrake
text: The people of Outer Fernbrake are growing to distrust Thea's leadership.
blocka: xxICE Gain one xxDISCORD for each xxTHREAT in the threat draw pile.

title: House of Cloves
text: Swirls of intoxicating smoke tie together the deals and favors with an ephemeral bond.
blocka: Spend 6 xxFORTUNE to gain two xxMANA dice.

title: Graywash Spring
text: The river out of North Oaks winds its way through the community of close knit cottages.
blocka: xxACTION Gain a number of xxFOOD dice equal to security.

title: Goldspike
text: Who knows what future badness brings but the keeper of secrets in a chamber of gold?
blocka: xxACTION Draw a threat.

title: Hall of Brass
text: Zarrah greets all newcomers in the great hall of world renown.
blocka: xxQUICK One character at this location is weary.

title: Beetle Burrough
text: You look like someone who wants to know a secret?
blocka: xxACTION Spend 5 xxLUXURY to gain one xxSECRETS.

title: Wrenhouse
text: Both regret and conviction in equal measure.
blocka: Gain 2 xxDISCORD to gain one xxLUXURY die.
